sql: SELECT * FROM `ucsb`.`registrar_lectures_undergrad` WHERE (CONCAT(`courseTitle`,' - ',`fullTitle`) = 'CMPSC 111 - Introduction to Computational Science');

data.description: Introduction to computational science, emphasizing basic numerical algorithms   and the informed use of mathematical software. Matrix computation, systems of   linear and nonlinear equations, interpolation and zero finding, differential   equations, numer
data.preReq: Mathematics 6A; Computer Science 24 with a grade of C or better.
